title: Directs New York city board of education to provide school attendants on school buses
summary: Directs the New York city board of education to place school attendants on school buses transporting children in grades kindergarten through grade eight.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         2047

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                   January 18, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen.  KRUGER -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Education

       AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to requiring the board of
         education in the city of New York to provide school bus attendants

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section  1.  Section  2554 of the education law is amended by adding a
    2  new subdivision 28 to read as follows:
    3    28. TO PROVIDE, IN THE CITY OF NEW  YORK,  SCHOOL  BUS  ATTENDANTS  AS
    4  DEFINED IN SECTION ONE THOUSAND TWO HUNDRED TWENTY-NINE-D OF THE VEHICLE
    5  AND  TRAFFIC  LAW  FOR  ALL SCHOOL BUSES TRANSPORTING STUDENTS IN GRADES
    6  KINDERGARTEN THROUGH EIGHTH GRADE IN SUCH CITY.
    7    S 2. This act shall  take  effect  on  the  first  of  September  next
    8  succeeding the date on which it shall have become a law.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD07435-01-1
